pingball.simulation.collidable

Class Line

  • java.lang.Object
    • pingball.simulation.collidable.Line
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Collidable

    public class Line
extends java.lang.Object
implements Collidable
    A line segment. Represent a line that can possibly be rotating. Any ball can collide with this line. Rep Invariant: -

    physics.Vect centerOfRotation)
        Make a Line.
        Parameters:
        start - The start position of the line segment.
        end - The end position of the line segment.
        reflectionCoeff - The coefficient of reflection of the line segment.
        centerOfRotation - The center of rotation of the line segment.

      • collide

        public void collide(Ball ball)
        Perform a collision with a ball. Updates the velocity of this ball according to how it would behave if it hit this wall.
        Specified by:
        collide in interface Collidable
        Parameters:
        ball - The ball that is colliding with this.

      • setRotating

        public void setRotating(double angularVelocity)
        Set the rotating state for this line. This method does not actually move the line.
        Specified by:
        setRotating in interface Collidable
        Parameters:
        angularVelocity - The angular velocity (in radians per second) that this is rotating.
